data.name: Offside R  18+ Adults Only Patch
data.detailed_description: R 18+ Adults only patch adds extended and unabridged story with optional sex scenes.
data.about_the_game: R 18+ Adults only patch adds extended and unabridged story with optional sex scenes.
data.short_description: R 18+ Adults only patch adds extended and unabridged story with optional sex scenes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains sexual scenes between women, nudity, strong language, and mature humor. It is recommended for mature audiences only.
